title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 08 July 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (08/07/2008 08:25): XWiki.pvsaikrishna was modified by XWiki.pvsaikrishna (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/pvsaikrishna  
SaiKrishna - (08/07/2008 08:45): how can I create a directory named "lucene" in http://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/sandbox/plugins/ ??  
SaiKrishna - (08/07/2008 08:54): I want to commit my code for distributed search into the directory http://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/sandbox/plugins/lucene  
xwikibot - (08/07/2008 09:30): Design.NewWysiwygEditorInterface was modified by xwiki:XWiki.GuillaumeLerouge - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/NewWysiwygEditorInterface  
xwikibot - (08/07/2008 09:31): Design.NewWysiwygEditorInterface was modified by xwiki:XWiki.GuillaumeLerouge - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/NewWysiwygEditorInterface  
xwikibot - (08/07/2008 09:32): Design.NewWysiwygEditorInterface was modified by xwiki:XWiki.GuillaumeLerouge - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/NewWysiwygEditorInterface  
xwikibot - (08/07/2008 09:34): Design.NewWysiwygEditorInterface was modified by xwiki:XWiki.GuillaumeLerouge - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/NewWysiwygEditorInterface  
xwikibot - (08/07/2008 09:35): Design.NewWysiwygEditorInterface was modified by xwiki:XWiki.GuillaumeLerouge - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/NewWysiwygEditorInterface  
Tutee1 - (08/07/2008 10:34): Hi guys, back to ask a few questions again  
Tutee1 - (08/07/2008 10:35): Can anyone recommend a reliable server for xwiki? I would rather it was free but the most important thing is that it is reliable  
jvdrean - (08/07/2008 10:36): Tutee1: an application server ?  
Tutee1 - (08/07/2008 10:37): a server to host my xwiki (not sure of the teminology)  
Tutee1 - (08/07/2008 10:38): I have had problems with xwiki on previous servers because they don't like its processing  requirements  
Tutee1 - (08/07/2008 10:53): no-one got any suggestions?  
jvelociter - (08/07/2008 11:36): news  
xwikibot - (08/07/2008 11:36): Last 5 pages modified:  
xwikibot - (08/07/2008 11:36):   \* IRC.xwikiArchive20080708 - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/IRC/xwikiArchive20080708, by XWiki.XWikiGuest

xwikibot - (08/07/2008 11:55): Main.ReleaseNotes was modified by XWiki.jvdrean (Added XE 1.5RC1) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ReleaseNotes  
xwikibot - (08/07/2008 12:11): XWiki.XWikiCommittersGroup was modified by xwiki:XWiki.Sergiu - http://sandbox.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/XWikiCommittersGroup  
xwikibot - (08/07/2008 12:11): XWiki.XWikiCommittersGroup was modified by xwiki:XWiki.Sergiu - http://sandbox.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/XWikiCommittersGroup  
Tutee1 - (08/07/2008 12:27): sdumitriu\_: I asked a question earlier - I'm not sure if you were online. I'm looking for a server to host my wiki (it is currently running off my desktop) do you have any suggestions?  
sdumitriu\_ - (08/07/2008 12:28): Hi, no, I didn't see your question  
sdumitriu\_ - (08/07/2008 12:28): What kind of hosting?  
xwikibot - (08/07/2008 12:28): Main.ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise15RC1 was modified by XWiki.jvdrean (Initial version) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise15RC1  
Tutee1 - (08/07/2008 12:29): well, I've built the wiki on my PC and now I want to put is on a server somewhere, which will allow people to access it all the time  
xwikibot - (08/07/2008 12:33): Main.ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise15RC1 was modified by XWiki.jvdrean - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise15RC1  
thomasmortagne - (08/07/2008 12:33): Tutee1: there is myxwiki.org  
sdumitriu\_ - (08/07/2008 12:33): You can either use the free myxwiki.org, which is not a reliable host  
sdumitriu\_ - (08/07/2008 12:33): Or you can buy paied hosting from the XWiki company  
thomasmortagne - (08/07/2008 12:33): disclaimer : myxwiki.org is also used has big test for XWiki and is always running on the last dev version  
sdumitriu\_ - (08/07/2008 12:34): Yes, not reliable = no guarantees  
Tutee1 - (08/07/2008 12:34): and that allows me to upload the wiki I have created, i.e will I have full control - not just be allowed to uses a few options?  
sdumitriu\_ - (08/07/2008 12:34): Yes, full control  
sdumitriu\_ - (08/07/2008 12:34): You willl be admin on your wiki  
Tutee1 - (08/07/2008 12:35): ok, so that is www.xwiki.com?  
sdumitriu\_ - (08/07/2008 12:35): No  
sdumitriu\_ - (08/07/2008 12:35): www.myxwiki.org  
sdumitriu\_ - (08/07/2008 12:35): xwiki.com is the old farm  
Tutee1 - (08/07/2008 12:36): so for a reasonably small site, any idea of typical costs?  
sdumitriu\_ - (08/07/2008 12:36): For paid hosting?  
Tutee1 - (08/07/2008 12:36): yes  
sdumitriu\_ - (08/07/2008 12:36): I don't know... I'm not in charge of that  
Tutee1 - (08/07/2008 12:37): ok, I will try it on the myxwiki.org and work from there  
Tutee1 - (08/07/2008 12:37): many thanks  
sdumitriu\_ - (08/07/2008 12:38): http://www.xwiki.com/xwiki/bin/view/Services/Hosting  
Tutee1 - (08/07/2008 12:38): the prices are probably a little out of my price range but thank you  
Tutee1 - (08/07/2008 12:43): sdumitriu\_:  which mailing list should I contact to request hosting on myxwiki?  
sdumitriu\_ - (08/07/2008 12:44): [[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)  
Tutee1 - (08/07/2008 12:44): ok, thank you  
Tutee1 - (08/07/2008 12:48): sent it
